title: A New Bakery Opens in Town

sentences.de: In unserer Stadt gibt es eine neue Bäckerei.
sentences.en: There is a new bakery in our town.

sentences.de: Die Bäckerei öffnet jeden Morgen um sechs Uhr.
sentences.en: The bakery opens every morning at six o'clock.

sentences.de: Es gibt Brot, Brötchen und Kuchen.
sentences.en: There is bread, rolls and cake.
Many people come in the morning.
The baker's name is Mr Fischer.
